info.title: Swyftx API
info.description:
Backend API for Swyftx.

This API is in Beta. It may change without notice. This documentation was last updated for v1.258.3.

## Authentication

A JSON Web Token (JWT) needs to be included in the Authorization header for secured requests:
- `Authorization: Bearer <token>`

To obtain a JWT:
1. Create an API key from the API Keys section of your Swyftx Profile
2. Send a request to `/auth/refresh/` using the API Key to receive back a JWT
3. Use the JWT in the Authorization header for authenticated requests

Access tokens last for a week before expiring.

## Pagination

On endpoints that accept pagination, add to the query string:
- `?limit={resultsPerPage}&page={pageNumber}`
- `limit` (number, optional) - Number of entries you would like returned
- `page` (number, optional) - Which page to return (1-based indexing)

## Demo Mode

Demo mode allows developers to test and integrate with the API without making actual transactions.
To use demo mode, change the base URL to `https://api.demo.swyftx.com.au`
